        public static String abbreviateText(String text,
                                    int numberOfCharacters)
        Abbreviate a text to _approximately_ some number of characters, trying to find a nice word end and then appending three dots.

      • concat

        public static String concat(Collection<String> strings,
                            String separator)
        Concatenates a collection of strings by concatenating the strings and inserting a separator in between each of them. Nulls are handled automatically and there is no separator at the end of sequence.
        Parameters:
        strings - collection of strings (collection may contain null objects, those are ignored)
        separator - the separator
        Returns:
        concatenated string

      • concat

        public static String concat(String[] strings,
                            String separator)
        Concatenates an array of strings by concatenating the strings and inserting a separator in between each of them. Nulls are handled automatically and there is no separator at the end of sequence.
        Parameters:
        strings - the strings
        separator - the separator
        Returns:
        concatenated string

      • removeEmptyValues

        public static List<String> removeEmptyValues(List<String> values)
        Remove empty (length zero when trimmed) values from a list.

      • removeEmptyValues

        public static String[] removeEmptyValues(String[] values)
        Remove empty (length zero when trimmed) values from an array.

      • replacePlaceHolders

        public static String replacePlaceHolders(String variableName,
                                         String replacementValue,
                                         String template)
        Replaces ${variableName} variable in a template with the replacement value provided.
        Parameters:
        variableName - variable name
        replacementValue - replacement value
        template - string which contains variable e.g My name is ${username} and my login is ${login}
        Returns:
        string (template with string replacements)

      • simplifyMimeType

        public static String simplifyMimeType(String mimeType)
        Simplify a genuine mime type into a simple one like "pdf", "image" or an extension like "doc".

      • getExtensionFromMimeType

        public static String getExtensionFromMimeType(String mimeType)
        Get an extension from a mime type.
